name: audiobookshelf
description: Audiobookshelf is a self-hosted audiobook and podcast server. It supports multi-user access, metadata syncing, offline listening, and mobile-friendly playback. It integrates with clients like Jellyfin and supports OPDS.

features.title: Audiobook Server
features.description: Stream audiobooks and podcasts from your library. Personal audio platform

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create accounts for family members with individual progress. Shared library

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Automatic book information and cover art. Professional organization

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Download for offline playback on mobile. Listen anywhere

features.title: Mobile Apps
features.description: Native apps for iOS and Android devices. Optimized experience

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your audiobook collection. Privacy guaranteed
